Hi, I'm Seb Kay

I Design & Build Websites

I'm a web designer and front-end developer from Hampshire, UK. I build bespoke websites to help my clients push their businesses further online.

My expertise is in web design, WordPress development, eCommerce stores and SEO optimisation. If you'd like me to get involved with helping your business grow, I'm all ears!
